SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.initMusic.service

Class PlaylistServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
edu.carroll.initMusic.service.PlaylistServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaylistService
@Service public class PlaylistServiceImpl extends Object implements PlaylistService
Service class which interacts with playlists. Handles functions like creating, renaming, and deleting playlists, and adding/removing songs from them.
Since:
October 23, 2024

  • Method Details

    • createPlaylist

      public MethodOutcome createPlaylist(String name, User user)
      Creates a new playlist for the given user with the given username. Returns true if the playlist was created. It will false if the given user doesn't exist, the user already has a playlist with the given name, or if the given name isn't valid (Is blank).
      Specified by:
      createPlaylist in interface PlaylistService
      Parameters:
      name - Name of new playlist
      user - User who created playlist
      Returns:
      MethodOutcome Enum which corresponds to outcome of function
      See Also:
      • MethodOutcome

    • addSongToPlaylist

      public MethodOutcome addSongToPlaylist(Playlist playlist, Song song)
      Adds a song to the given playlist. This first searches for the playlist by id. It should always find a playlist, because when used, it takes the playlist id directly from a playlist object that has already been created.
      Specified by:
      addSongToPlaylist in interface PlaylistService
      Parameters:
      playlist - playlist to add song to
      song - Song to add to playlist
      Returns:
      MethodOutcome, the outcome of the method

    • getRepoSize

      public long getRepoSize()
      Retrieves the number of playlists currently stored in the playlist repository.
      Specified by:
      getRepoSize in interface PlaylistService
      Returns:
      the size of the playlist repository.

    • clearRepo

      public void clearRepo()
      Clears all playlists from the repository. This is primarily useful for testing or resetting data.
      Specified by:
      clearRepo in interface PlaylistService
